# Data Analysis for Student Recognition

**Description:**
Implement analytics to identify and recognize students who excel in academics, extra-curricular activities, or both. Use the integrated data to generate reports and highlight top performers.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Analyze combined academic and activity data for each student.
- Generate lists of high-achieving students based on configurable criteria.
- Display recognition badges or awards in the UI.
- Provide reports for teachers and admins.

**Benefits:**
- Encourages student participation and achievement.
- Helps teachers and admins allocate resources and support.
- Makes student accomplishments visible to the community.
